# glysmith

Be overwhelmed by the complexity of glycoverse? Try glysmith! Perform
the comprehensive analysis pipeline with one function call. Even better,
you can get a polished report directly in your browser.

## Installation

You can install the development version of glysmith from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("glycoverse/glysmith")
```

## Example

Coming soon!

# Package index

## All functions

- [`blueprint()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/blueprint.md)
  : Create a Blueprint
- [`blueprint_default()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/blueprint_default.md)
  : Default blueprint
- [`cast_exp()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/cast_exp.md)
  [`cast_plot()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/cast_exp.md)
  [`cast_table()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/cast_exp.md)
  : Get Plots or Tables from GlySmith Result
- [`forge_analysis()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/forge_analysis.md)
  : Forge an Analysis for Group Comparison
- [`polish_report()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/polish_report.md)
  : Render a HTML Report for GlySmith Results
- [`quench_result()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/quench_result.md)
  : Save GlySmith Result
- [`step_dea()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/step_dea.md)
  : Step: Differential Expression Analysis (DEA)
- [`step_derive_traits()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/step_derive_traits.md)
  : Step: Derived Trait Calculation
- [`step_dta()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/step_dta.md)
  : Step: Differential Trait Analysis (DTA)
- [`step_enrich()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/step_enrich.md)
  : Step: Enrichment Analysis
- [`step_enrich_go()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/step_enrich_go.md)
  : Step: GO Enrichment Analysis
- [`step_enrich_kegg()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/step_enrich_kegg.md)
  : Step: KEGG Enrichment Analysis
- [`step_enrich_reactome()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/step_enrich_reactome.md)
  : Step: Reactome Enrichment Analysis
- [`step_ident_overview()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/step_ident_overview.md)
  : Step: Identification Overview
- [`step_pca()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/step_pca.md)
  : Step: Principal Component Analysis (PCA)
- [`step_preprocess()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/step_preprocess.md)
  : Step: Preprocessing
- [`step_volcano()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glysmith/reference/step_volcano.md)
  : Step: Volcano Plot
